title: The Bongles - TV Dinner
description: The Bongles series explores the world of the magical Bongle Planet with its colourful bouncy creatures and delivers a green environment message presented in an offbeat and fun way.In this story, a TV washes up on the Bongles’ pristine beach. To Big Bubba’s surprise a picture of a delicious looking pie appears on the screen. Big Bubba excitedly sniffs and then eats the TV with the picture of the pie showing through his tummy. As he coughs and splutters, The Twins try to help him by tickling him. Eventually peace is restored when Bubba coughs up the TV, and they all sit down to enjoy the Bongle Ball World Cup on the newly-found telly.
author: Oscar Van Heek
